mapper.select: SELECT *,u.name AS app_name FROM t_bg_order b LEFT JOIN t_xt_order o ON b.order_no = o.order_no LEFT JOIN t_xt_order_detail d ON b.order_no = d.order_no LEFT JOIN t_app_user u ON o.job_no = u.job_no WHERE b.type = 1 ORDER BY b.state

SELECT *,u.name AS app_name,w.nickname,w.tel AS wx_tel,w.type AS wx_type FROM t_bg_order b LEFT JOIN t_xt_order o ON b.order_no = o.order_no LEFT JOIN t_xt_order_detail d ON b.order_no = d.order_no LEFT JOIN t_app_user u ON o.job_no = u.job_no LEFT JOIN t_wx_user w ON o.open_id = w.openid WHERE b.type = 0 AND b.state = 0 AND o.state NOT IN (5,11) ORDER BY b.state

SELECT *,u.name AS app_name,w.nickname,w.tel AS wx_tel,w.type AS wx_type FROM t_bg_order b LEFT JOIN t_xt_order o ON b.order_no = o.order_no LEFT JOIN t_xt_order_detail d ON b.order_no = d.order_no LEFT JOIN t_app_user u ON o.job_no = u.job_no LEFT JOIN t_wx_user w ON o.open_id = w.openid WHERE b.state = 0 AND o.state NOT IN (5,11)
